title: Come From Away cast commemorates 9/11 anniversary with Tiny Desk Concert | CBC Music
text:
"We were on a plane for over an entire day."

Come From Away tells the true story of when 38 planes carrying thousands of passengers from all over the world were diverted to Gander, N.L., when U.S. air space was closed on Sept. 11, 2001. The Canadian hit musical is now on Broadway, and to commemorate the 18th anniversary of 9/11, NPR's Tiny Desk Concert invited some cast members to perform a handful of their songs.

Watch the 16 cast members cram behind Bob Boilen's (not so tiny) desk for a heart-filling performance. For more on the musical, listen to Tom Power's q interview with cast member Steffi DiDomenicantonio before a run of shows in St. John's earlier this year.
description: The hit Canadian musical, now on Broadway, tells the story of what happened in Gander, N.L., that tragic day.
